name: Logic Lines Puzzle
description:
"Logic Lines Puzzle" is a simple challenging puzzle game.

The aim is to change the color of the cells by the special elements - pointers.

Drag the special cells (spores) onto the board to repaint the cells of corresponding lines.

If you do not know how to solve the problem - it does not matter.
"Solution" button is available without restriction.

"Logic Lines Puzzle" is a very exciting puzzle game.

All the tasks are divided into 5 categories of complexity.
Each categorie has 500 levels.

There are total (5x500) = 2500 tasks.
